name: PhD Labs
description:
Like any great team, ours is full of passionate people. Everyone brings their unique set of multi-disciplinary skills to help craft every project from the ground up.  We have16 years of experience as a solid, delivery-driven, development company. Through blood, sweat, and tears, we have have mapped out the possible problems ahead. We are here to help navigate the potholes and hiccups, providing solutions before they become problems.
Think of us as your app’s life coach, here to make sure it reaches its full potential. You have the vision and we have the road map, LETS DRIVE!
